name: Biplane Battles
description:
(Note: has a tendency to crash on modern version of Windows :/ )

A little shooter game where you fly a plane and blow the bajeezus out of stuff.

Features:

  • Destructible terrain!
  • Way more particle effects than I needed!
  • Planes!
  • Little soldiers that go "bleh" when you shoot them!
  • Carpet-bombing!

Tipz N' Trickz:

  • If you bump your plane into your home base, you can refill your bombs up to 10 (If you have more, it won't do anything).
  • You'll probably end up needing to use the decelerate button more often than the accelerate button.
  • Along the way, you'll encounter small enemy bases (Not the final objective). If you blow these up, you can get between 4 and 16 bombs.
  • A good dogfighting technique is to get close enough to the enemy that they fly away from you, then match their speed and barrage them with bullets.
  • Explosions destroy planes, so a well-placed bomb blast could create a chain reaction.
  • Bases take a direct hit with a bomb to destroy, just being in range of an explosion isn't enough.
